Class SRILMNgramModel

All Implemented Interfaces:
Reversible, FeatureExtractor, SignScorer
public class SRILMNgramModel
extends NgramScorer

A language model that uses the SRI language modeling toolkit.

Constructor Detail

SRILMNgramModel

public SRILMNgramModel(int order,
                       File lmFile,
                       boolean useSemClasses,
                       SRILMNgramModelType modelType)
                throws IOException
Creates a SRILM language model with the specified ngram order and model type.

Parameters:
order - The ngram order to use.
lmFile - The file to read the langauge model from.
useSemClasses - Whether or not to use semantic classes.
modelType - The type of language model.
Throws:
IOException - If a problem occurs reading the language model file. These include non-existent or unreadable files, file format problems, etc.

Method Detail

loadLMFromFile

protected void loadLMFromFile(int ngramOrder,
                              File lmFile,
                              SRILMNgramModelType lmType)
                       throws IOException
Loads an LM from a file.

Parameters:
ngramOrder - The ngram order to use.
lmFile - The file containing the language model.
lmType - The type of langauge model to expect.
Throws:
IOException - If the language model file is non-existent or null, or if a problem occurs loading or parsing the file.

logProb

public float logProb(int pos,
                     int len)
Calculates a log probability of a delineated substring of the strings to score using SRILM. This method reverses the context before passing the string to SRILM, as this is the format SRILM expects.

Overrides:
logProb in class NgramScorer
Parameters:
pos - The start position (inclusive) within the strings to score.
len - The length, starting from pos, of the string that should be used.

prepareToScoreWords

protected void prepareToScoreWords()
Converts the words in wordsToScore to strings in stringsToScore, before scoring.

Overrides:
prepareToScoreWords in class NgramScorer

logProbFromNgram

protected float logProbFromNgram(int i,
                                 int order)
Returns the log prob of the ngram starting at the given index in wordsToScore and with the given order, with backoff. (Assumes words in wordsToScore have already been converted to strings in stringsToScore, via call to prepareToScoreWords.)

Specified by:
logProbFromNgram in class NgramScorer
